scripts.build: npm run build:deps && npm run build:rs
scripts.build:deps: npm run build:css && npm run build:jsts && npm run minify
scripts.format: npm run format:rs && npm run format:ts && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify-disabled: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser src-frontend/js/prefetch.js > ./target/generated/js/prefetch.min.js && npx terser src-frontend/js/login.js > ./target/generated/js/login.min.js && npx terser src-frontend/js/login.js > ./target/generated/js/login.min.js && npx terser src-frontend/js/site-home.js > ./target/generated/js/site-home.min.js && npx terser src-frontend/js/site-index.js > ./target/generated/js/site-index.min.js && npx terser src-frontend/js/signup.js > ./target/generated/js/signup.min.js
